charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F - Possession with Intent to Distribute 1,000 Grams or More of Heroin
21:846=ND.F - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS which offense involved 1,000 grams or more of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of Heroin(1s)
